description: Cross-Server Content Playback: Enhanced support for playing content across different servers with seamless switching and improved server selection logic
Recently Released Section: New home section showing recently released content with customizable data loading
Jellyseerr Advanced Request Dialog: Enhanced request functionality with server selection, profile/root folder selection, quality options, request cancellation, and keyword/genre browsing
Standardized Focus Indicators: Applied consistent HD focus bitmap across home screen rows, detail pages (cast/crew sections), and search results for improved navigation feedback
Media Bar Toggle: Refactored media bar functionality with new toggle setting for easier control
Login Scene UI Update: Refreshed login interface with improved visual design and button handling
Translation Updates: Updated translations for Portuguese (Brazil), German, Catalan, Italian, Spanish, and Swedish
Skip Segment Translations: Enabled translation support for skip segment buttons
Upstream Updates: Merged upstream version 3.0.15 and 3.1.0 changes from jellyfin/jellyfin-roku
Special thanks to the Jellyfin Roku upstream project and all contributors!
author: Mr Moonfin - @RadicalMuffinMan on GitHub
